oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother James Albert Oelkers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chemistry; Laboratories; Equipment; De La Salle Christian Brothers; Teachers; Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Brother James Albert Oelkers taught students in a chemistry lab at Christian Brothers College.
In addition to teaching, his abilities as a craftsman saw him grading the grounds for parking lots, making keys, or taking care of campus power outages.
